fields.title: I'm new to the game anyone want to show me the ropes
fields.body: I'm just learning to play, anyone want to go easy on me and show me the ropes?

fields.title: My buddy just gave me this
fields.body: Just got this jank mono blue deck that I want to play, anyone else up for it?

fields.title: Who wants to play some standard?
fields.body: I'll be at Mavericks in Mason on 42, if anyone wants to get some games in.

fields.title: Anyone want to play some modern?
fields.body: I'll be at Mavericks if you want to get some games in
